data.title: Algobrix function blocks can now communicate in 360

body.text:
Greetings to our Awesome Backers!!!

Since we launched our campaign we have been working on a new and exciting feature: rotating the function blocks.

How does it work? What does it mean?

Our initial function block design allowed us to work with only one possible orientation. Knowing how kids think and operate we were concerned that they might get a frustrated by connecting the function blocks in the wrong direction, but not any more!
Now they can connect the function blocks with any orientation they would like and everything would work exactly the same!

data.title: They put me in handcuffs in front of my kids

body.text: Once I was there, I got my chance – two jobs, working six days a week at each of them. I worked at McDonald’s, starting a shift at 5am and getting out at 2pm, then I went to work in a taqueria. Once I was there, I got my chance – two jobs, working six days a week at each of them. I worked at McDonald’s, starting a shift at 5am and getting out at 2pm, then I went to work in a taqueria.
